segments.text: Welcome to Desmos, your online graphing calculator. We'll start by launching the website.
See that 'Add Item' button? Clicking it lets us enter new functions. I'm adding '2x + 1' here. There's also an option to edit the expression list.
You can manage your functions easily. Let's hide the first one we added. So this is how you toggle functions on and off.
Desmos has lots of graph options. Check out these customization features. We can change the grid, axis, and even add labels.
